cleaned_text: Our Balance Crystal Candle is centred around the Clear Quartz - a balancing, cleansing stone used to help bring the body into balance and revitalise the physical, mental, emotional and spiritual being. Combined with Eucalyptus which works with the breath to sharpen senses, rebalance and centre, while Mint is used for spiritual protection, purification and cleansing. A beautiful choice of candle for meditation practice.
